title: Code Studies
description: Collaboration with the Chair for History of Technology at the ETH Zürich (Prof. Dr. David Guggerli, Dr. Daniela Zetti, Dr. Ricky Wichum).

title: Computational Sciences and Simulation
description: Collaboration with the German Climate Computing Center (Prof. Dr. Thomas Ludwig), the Institute of Philosophy and the IT Center of the TU Darmstadt (Prof. Dr. Petra Gehring, Prof. Dr. Christoph Bischof), the Supercomputing Center Stuttgart (Prof. Dr. Michael Resch, Dr. Andreas Kaminski), and the IT Center RWTH Aachen University (Prof. Dr. Matthias Müller).

title: Affect- and Psycho-Technology Studies
description: Scientific Network of media scientists, philosophers and psychologists on the increasing influence of affective computing (hosted by the University of Potsdam). Publication of the network: Bösel, Bernd and Wiemer, Serjoscha. (eds.) (2019). Affective Media and Policy. Lüneburg: Meson Press. (2020). Download: https://meson.press/books/affective-transformations/

title: Retrospective Code Analysis
description: Collaboration with the Chair of Software Engineering at the RWTH Aachen (Prof. Dr. Bernhard Rumpe) in the DFG-project Science-induced retrospective code analysis.

title: Algorithmic Regimes
description: Scientific Network with scholars from Philosophy of Science, Sociology, STS and Computational Science on the impact, epistemology, and media techniques of algorithmic systems at the intersection of science and society (since 2018).
